ServicesSection.title: Zhivar Sanat Kian Services
ServicesSection.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian, comprised of a young, experienced, and technically skilled team, was established in 2021 with the goal of playing a greater role in the country's development. The company has made remarkable strides in asset preservation, safety, environmental friendliness, responsibility, business ethics, innovation, and excellence. Leveraging its valuable experience in executing industrial projects, it has sought synergy to attract and undertake national projects. Equipped for the execution of large-scale industrial and mining projects, pump stations, water transmission pipelines, and water, oil, and gas treatment facilities, the company aspires to contribute more effectively to the prosperity and development of its homeland.

ProjectsSection.title: Recent Projects
ProjectsSection.description: Given the nature of large-scale projects, the execution complexities are increasing, with complex data, control systems, and safety measures becoming crucial. Moreover, higher expectations in productivity, reliability, safety, and the dynamic environments in which projects are executed further challenge design and execution teams. Based on this, Zhivar Sanat Kian Company has relied on its knowledge and experience, focusing on performance planning and optimization with a 'systemic approach' to achieve its goals and ensure optimal project execution, a summary of which is presented here.

commerce.title: Commerce & Project Supply
commerce.desc: In the complex world of trade, procurement is considered one of the most specialized areas of international trade. Zhiwar Sanat Kian, with experience and a brilliant track record in commercial affairs, is recognized by all economic actors as a prominent figure in the field of supply of goods and services, import, and export. The most important principles and needs in import and export include the provision of commercial and NIMA foreign exchange services, the process of domestic and foreign procurement, familiarity with the principles and techniques of domestic and international marketing, and transportation. All these processes are handled by Zhiwar Sanat Kian.

operation.title: Industrial & Mining Operations
operation.desc: The management and execution of commissioning, maintenance, facilities, and equipment, as well as training programs in industrial and mining sectors and other related processes, are carried out by Zhiwar Sanat Kian.

management.title: Industrial & Mining Management
management.desc: The changing nature of industries and the increasing complexity of new projects have driven Iranian companies to improve their capabilities and adopt new, systematic approaches to ensure successful project execution. Moreover, the adoption of modern approaches in management, construction, pre-commissioning, and commissioning in industrial projects is imperative.

By leveraging technical knowledge, a specialized team, and an extensive network of suppliers and business partners worldwide, we meet the needs of our customers with the highest quality and in the shortest possible time.

Management.title: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Management
Management.default: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Management
Management.description: The expertise of Zhivar Sanat Kian lies in providing comprehensive project management services that help the client complete their projects on time, within the defined scope and budget, and with the desired quality. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality services tailored to the unique needs of the client, especially in EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction) projects.
